bacci.giovanni.deunifier.DeUniFier.io

Class FastaPointersSequences

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacci.giovanni.deunifier.DeUniFier.io.FastaPointersSequences

  • public class FastaPointersSequences
extends Object
    This class reads a Fasta sequences file using a RandomAccessFile. Each sequence pointer is stored in a List.
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Sequence get(int index)
             throws IOException
        Return the specified sequence as a ByteSequence. The index has to be an integer between 0 and size() otherwise an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown
        Parameters:
        index - index of the sequence
        Returns:
        the sequence as a ByteSequence
        Throws:
